title: Charges Recommended For Cleveland Police Who Fatally Shot 12-Year-Old Boy
teaser: A judge has ruled that there's enough evidence to charge two Cleveland police officers in the fatal shooting of 12-year-old Tamir Rice. He was killed in November while carrying a replica gun outside a recreation center. The judge, however, cannot compel prosecutors to charge the officers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
